intro_text: Your patrol finds a loner who is interested in joining the Clan
success_text: The patrol convinces the loner to join the Clan
decline_text: Your patrol decides not to confront the loner
antagonize_text: Your patrol drives the loner off of the territory
antagonize_fail_text: The loner is taken aback by their hostility and decides that Clan life is not for them

intro_text: Your patrol finds a loner who is interested in joining the Clan
success_text: The patrol convinces the loner to join the Clan and they bring with them a litter of kits
decline_text: Your patrol decides not to confront the loner
antagonize_text: Your patrol drives the loner off of the territory
antagonize_fail_text: The loner is taken aback by their hostility and decides that Clan life is not for them

intro_text: Your patrol finds a kittypet who is interested in joining the Clan
success_text: The patrol convinces the kittypet to join the Clan
fail_text: The description of Clan life frightens the kittypet
decline_text: Your patrol decides not to confront the kittypet
antagonize_text: Your patrol drives the kittypet off of the territory
antagonize_fail_text: The kittypet is taken aback by their hostility and decides that Clan life is not for them

intro_text: r_c finds a wounded cat near the thunderpath
success_text: The patrol brings the cat back to camp. Once nursed back to health, the cat decides to join the Clan
fail_text: As r_c inspects the cat, they find that they are already hunting with their ancestors
decline_text: They leave the wounded cat alone
antagonize_text: Your patrol drives the cat off of the territory
antagonize_fail_text: The wounded cat is killed in an attempt to drive them off of the territory

intro_text: r_c finds a loner who offers their healing skills in exchange for shelter
success_text: The new medicine cat is welcomed into the clan
fail_text: After hearing more about your clan, the loner decides not to join
antagonize_text: Your patrol drives the cat off of the territory
antagonize_fail_text: The loner is taken aback by their hostility and decides this clan is not for them
